text: William Peter Bradshaw, Baron Bradshaw (born 9 September 1936), commonly known as Bill Bradshaw, is a British academic and politician. He is a Liberal Democrat member of the House of Lords. He was formerly also a County Councillor in Oxfordshire from 1993 until his resignation in January 2008. ==References== ==Other websites== *Announcement of Bradshaw's introduction into the House of Lords, House of Lords minutes of proceedings, 26 July 1999 Category:1936 births Category:Living people Category:Liberal Democrat Life Peers Category:Politicians from Oxfordshire
title: William Bradshaw, Baron Bradshaw
